data.text:
As per Gordon, the slip refers to judgment captured. 
The error is being experienced by all  captures, their judgment counter is not accurate. Its fluctuating, each judgment they capture is either added onto their daily target counter or it subtracts from that same counter. They are not able to keep track of their target as a result of that. The counter that seems to be the giving incorrect counts is the â€œ Captured with IDâ€ counter.@yasserogier
